name: IMP_STENT_DIMENSIONS
description: This table contains data for the dimensions of custom made abdominal aortic aneurysm stents.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: AORTIC_NECK_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the aortic neck for the custom made stent

columns.name: AORTIC_NECK_DIAM
columns.description: The diameter of the aortic neck for the custom made stent

columns.name: R_COMMON_ILIAC_DIAM
columns.description: The diameter of the right common iliac aneurysm for the custom made stent

columns.name: L_COMMON_ILIAC_DIAM
columns.description: The diameter of the left common iliac aneurysm for the custom made stent

columns.name: ILIAC_ANEURYSM_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: The location of the iliac aneurysm used for the custom made stent

columns.name: AORTA_NECK_ANGLE
columns.description: The angle of the aorta to the neck for the custom made stent

columns.name: NECK_AAA_ANGLE
columns.description: The angle of the neck to the abdominal aorta aneurysm for the custom made stent

columns.name: R_INTERNAL_ILIAC_DIAM
columns.description: The diameter of the right internal iliac aneurysm for the custom made stent

columns.name: L_INTERNAL_ILIAC_DIAM
columns.description: The diameter of the left internal iliac aneurysm for the custom made stent
